title: Mechanic
summaries: The Mechanic is an NPC who sells various mechanisms, as well as Wire Cutters and Wrenches, allowing the player to construct and activate wired devices like traps and critter engines. She can be found in the Dungeon in the Cavern layer or below after killing Skeletron, where she spawns randomly as the stationary Bound Mechanic. Talking to her in this state will free her. If the Bound Mechanic is killed, she will still be able to respawn afterwards; if the Mechanic NPC is killed, she will move in again after some time as long as there are vacant houses.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile</linked> versions, the Mechanic will attack nearby enemies. She will throw her <linked>Combat Wrench</linked> like a <linked>boomerang</linked> to defend herself, dealing 11 / <linked>16</linked> / <linked>19</linked> damage at the start of the game, and as players progress she will gain <linked>various stat increases</linked>. She can drop her weapon upon death.
The Bound Mechanic is one of the few entities that can be detected by the Lifeform Analyzer(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) or its upgrades.
